data.message: Excelent  work , how can I help?

replies.message: Hey there, Martha. #GivingTuesday is a global day dedicated to giving back. It is a day that charities, families, businesses, community centers, and students around the world come together for one common purpose: to celebrate generosity and to give. For more information, visit: http://on.fb.me/1In4KJr. -Kate
Spread the word, here is a link for Rex's fundraiser: https://www.gofundme.com/3gct86f6
Martha, we are also looking for people who are interested in starting a similar page locally and you can email ty@facinghomelessness.org for more information.  Thank you!
